005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.impl.DefaultContainerModelSupport;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
010
011import java.util.LinkedList;
012import java.util.List;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * A choice model builder.
018 * <p>
019 * Is extended to support other model builders (i.e. assembly model builders).
020 *
021 * @param <MI>
022 *          the model instance Java type
023 * @param <NMI>
024 *          the named model instance Java type
025 * @param <FI>
026 *          the field instance Java type
027 * @param <AI>
028 *          the assembly instance Java type
029 * @see DefaultChoiceGroupModelBuilder for a choice group model builder
030 * @see DefaultAssemblyModelBuilder for an assembly model builder
031 */
032public class DefaultChoiceModelBuilder<
033    MI extends IModelInstance,
034    NMI extends INamedModelInstance,
035    FI extends IFieldInstance,
036    AI extends IAssemblyInstance>
037    extends DefaultChoiceGroupModelBuilder<NMI, FI, AI> {
038  // collections to store model instances
039  @NonNull
040  private final List<MI> modelInstances = new LinkedList<>();
041
042  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
043  @Override
044  public void append(FI instance) {
045    modelInstances.add((MI) instance);
046    super.append(instance);
047  }
048
049  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
050  @Override
051  public void append(AI instance) {
052    modelInstances.add((MI) instance);
053    super.append(instance);
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Get the appended model instances.
058   *
059   * @return the instances or an empty list if no instances were appended
060   */
061  @NonNull
062  public List<MI> getModelInstances() {
063    return modelInstances;
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Build an immutable choice model container based on the appended instances.
068   *
069   * @return the container
070   */
071  @NonNull
072  public IContainerModelSupport<MI, NMI, FI, AI> buildChoice() {
073    return getModelInstances().isEmpty()
074        ? IContainerModelSupport.empty()
075        : new DefaultContainerModelSupport<>(
076            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(getModelInstances()),
077            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(getNamedModelInstances()),
078            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(getFieldInstances()),
079            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(getAssemblyInstances()));
080  }
081}
